NTR is just another genre just like any other out there for ppl to enjoy. I personally don't like the scat genre but that doesnt mean I have the right to judge ppl that like it, I mean, if thats what turns them on fine by me lol, I wont go and ruin their enjoyment of the doujin un the comment section with a moralist comment about why scatt is grosa ir what not. Same stuff happens here with ntr. I really do like netorare and vanilla on equal teens, but I have to admit that as far as I have checked, NTR doujins have the hottest fuck scenes in my opinion (and its cool if u disagree, thats just what I think), so I value it more for what the art is instead of what I can morally learn from It (cuz come on, we are here to either bust a nut or have a good read). So if u cant handle ntr cuz your morals dont let you accept it then just go and read other genres, theres no need to ruin the fun for others with opinions judging other ppls likings or beliefs.
